mapper.select: (select count(codegroup.ifcdSeq) from cgName codegroup where 1=1 and codegroup.cdDelNY = 0 and codegroup.ifcgSeq = code.ifcgSeq) as xifcdSeqCount
SELECT seq, cdName FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND seq =#{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO code(
cdDelNY, codeUsedNY, codeGroupCd, codeGroupName, codeCD, codeAlt, cdName, codeNameEng, codeOrder, codeRegDate, codeCorrectDate, codeGroup_seq )VALUES(
#{cdDelNY}, #{codeUsedNY}, #{codeGroupCd}, #{codeGroupName}, #{codeCD}, #{codeAlt}, #{cdName}, #{codeNameEng}, #{codeOrder}, #{codeRegDate}, #{codeCorrectDate}, #{codeGroup_seq}, )
SELECT last_insert_id()
